title: Fully rewritten from scratch.
changes: Written from scratch modern UI using HTML, ditching the old DearPyGUI library previously used.
Backend written in Python using Eel.
Download mods directly into your latest Beam.NG mods folder automatically.

title: Load time and mod link updates.
changes: Significantly reduced both first time load ins as well as all load times.
ALL broken links have been addressed (meaning a few mods have been deleted for the time being.)

title: UI Changes
changes: Added support for mod manager to certain users only.
